title: iVR-Based Electrical Engineering Simulation Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Implementation of a practice-centered educational environment using HMD-based iVR technology for current electrical engineering professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can identify electrical circuit components in an iVR environment and explain precise connection methods in 3D space
Learners can diagnose complex electrical circuit problems in virtual simulation environments and derive solutions with 80% accuracy
Learners can inspect electrical systems while adhering to safety protocols in actual workplaces based on iVR learning content

resources: 3D Modeling Software for Electrical Engineering Simulation

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
